ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We are those drawn up in ranks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And we are truly those who stand in rows,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily we range ourselves in rows (as humble servants)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And indeed we, with our wings spread, await the command.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, we (angels), we stand in rows;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely we are they who draw themselves out in ranks,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! we, even we are they who set the ranks,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: we are those who stand ranged in ranks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily we! we are ranged in ranks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It is we who are the ranged ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And we are verily ranged in ranks (for service);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, we (angels), we stand in rows for the prayers (as you Muslims stand in rows for your prayers);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We are surely those who are arranged in ranks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, we are those who line up [for prayer].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:165] And indeed it is we who are the rangers, of our feet in prayer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! we, even we, are they who set the ranks) in prayer.
